Metrics/AbcSize.description:
Description

A calculated magnitude based on number of assignments, branches, and conditions.
Metrics/AbcSize.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

References: ['https://wiki.c2.com/?AbcMetric', 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ABC_Software_Metric'] (type: list)
AllowedMethods: [] (type: list)
AllowedPatterns: [] (type: list)
CountRepeatedAttributes: True (type: bool)
Max: 17 (type: int)
